source:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_SEQ_00<tab>Regitt gazes glumly into the distance, perhaps wondering at the absence of some wayward automata.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※本クエストは受注時のクラスでのみ進行します。

ワッツハンマー・ガレージのレギットは、帰ってこないオートマトンを探してほしいようだ。

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TODO_00<tab>Search for wayward automata in the Forest of the Lost Shepherd.
target: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TODO_00<tab>迷える羊飼いの森でオートマトンを探す

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the wayward automata to Regitt.
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_000<tab>Ugh, where are they!? Those automata were due back ages ago! I sent them into the trees to gather materials, but they're nowhere to be seen.
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_000<tab>うーん……困ったラリ……。
オートマトンたちがぜんぜん帰ってこないラリ！
資材採取のために、迷える羊飼いの森へ向かわせたラリが……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_001<tab>We'll never be able to build our tanks at this rate. But if I just traipse off into the undergrowth to find them, I risk becoming as lost as that forest's titular shepherd. I really should study that map a bit more...
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_001<tab>このままじゃ、戦車が作れなくなるラリ。
けど、このあたりの土地勘がないワシらじゃ、
どうやって探したらいいかさーっぱりラリな……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_002<tab>Anyway! You're here now, and you are─I assume─far more familiar with the local geography. Do me a favor and bring back that pair of directionally challenged dolts!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_002<tab>だから、お前さんには迷える羊飼いの森へ行ってもらって、
帰ってこないオートマトンを回収してきてほしいラリよ！
面倒かもしれないけど、よろしくお願いするラリ～！

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_010<tab>Greetings, good mortal! What brings you into this wondrous woodland? If you've business with me, then I'm afraid it must wait. I have a previous and pressing engagement!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_010<tab>ハァ～～～イァッ！！
このボクちゃんにィ！　何のご用かなァン！？
いま忙しいからァ、あとにしてくれよォン！！

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_020<tab>Mischievous mortal, explain yourself at once! Why do you seek to abscond with this marvelous and mystical Fuath?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_020<tab>おやおやおォ～～やァ～～ッ！？
その可愛いフーア族を持っていってェ、
どうしようってつもりだァ～～～～イッ！？
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_021<tab>…………えっ、これはドワーフ族が造ったオートマトン？

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_022<tab>O cruel truth! I thought myself chasing some new worldly kin, who had sheathed their fae form with an iron-hard skin...
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_022<tab>そ、そんな……まさか……。
鋼鉄の皮膚を手に入れた新世界のフーア族だと思って、
必死に追いかけていたのに……なんて、酷い現実なんだ……。

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_023<tab>So much time, wasted! There are precious herbs to pluck and potions to brew. Take your prize and bother me no more!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_TALLFUATH_000_023<tab>ほら、そいつを探していたんだろ？
ボクは、本来の目的である錬金薬の素材集めで忙しいんだ。
もう構わないでくれ！

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_030<tab>Lali-ho! You found our wayward automata, then?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_030<tab>おお、戻ったラリか。
オートマトンは見つかったラリ？

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_040<tab>Got myself a stack of spare parts to fix these two. They don't seem particularly damaged at first glance, but let's take a look and see what went wrong... Hm?
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_040<tab>無事に回収できたラリね。
こっちも、交換用部品の準備が終わったところラリ！
けれど、見た感じどこも壊れてないラリ……ん？

source: TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_041<tab>Out of fuel...? But I gave 'em enough to last for bloody hours! Something must've been chasing them to burn up coal that fast. See, this is why we need those tanks!
target:
TEXT_BANDWA115_03916_REGITT_000_041<tab>こ、これは……燃料切れで帰ってこれなかっただけラリ。
魔物にでも追いかけられたラリか……？
ともかく、オートマトンを回収してくれて感謝ラリ～！
